inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addDamageImmunity('Fire', 'Stackable', 25); effect.getBonuses().addDamageImmunity('Cold', 'Stackable', 10); effect.getBonuses().addDamageImmunity('Electrical', 'Stackable', 10);parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Elemental Defense
description: You have worked with elemental magic so much that you have gained a natural immunity to it.  You gain a 25% Damage Immunity to Fire, Cold, and Electrical damage.
